explains: adj. 赔偿的；弥补的，补偿的

sentences.en: He received a compensatory payment of $20 000.
sentences.cn: 他获得了2万元的赔偿金。

sentences.en: The jury awarded $11.2 million in compensatory damages.
sentences.cn: 陪审团裁判1,120万美元的赔偿损失费。

sentences.en: The evaporation from the leaf surface causes a constant compensatory suction of water.
sentences.cn: 叶子表面的蒸发使水分不断地补充吸力。
